com.viaoa.object
Class OAObjectHashDelegate

java.lang.Object
  com.viaoa.object.OAObjectHashDelegate

public class OAObjectHashDelegate
extends java.lang.Object

List of Hashtables used by Delegates, some of which need to have OAObject rehashed when the ObjectKey is changed.

Author:
vincevia

Field Detail

hashLinkInfoCache

protected static java.util.Hashtable hashLinkInfoCache
Used by OALinkInfo to cache Hubs so that they are not strong linked within object. Key = OALinkInfo Value = Vector of Hubs. The number of hubs is determined by OALinkInfo.setCacheSize(x) method.

hashRootHub

protected static java.util.Hashtable<OAObjectInfo,Hub> hashRootHub
Used by OAObjectInfoDelegate to store the Root Hub for recursive classes. Key = Class Value = Hub (that is the 'top' (root) Hub of a recursive hub)

hashObjectInfo

protected static java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.lang.Class,OAObjectInfo> hashObjectInfo
Static cache of OAObjectInfo, keyed on Class. Key = Class Value = OAObjectINfo

hashLock

protected static java.util.Hashtable hashLock
Locking support for OAObject. See OALock Key = OAObject Value = OALock

hashPropertyLock

protected static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,OAObjectReflectDelegate.PropertyLock> hashPropertyLock
Used by OAObjectHubDelegate getObject() and getHub() when retrieving a value, to set a lock it is used in a thread safe manner. Key = OAObject GUID+"."+propertyName Value = lock info

hashCacheClass

protected static java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.lang.Class,java.lang.Object> hashCacheClass
Used by Cache to store all OAObjects. Key = Class Value = TreeMap with all of the OAObjects in it.

hashCacheListener

protected static java.util.Hashtable hashCacheListener
List of listeners for Cached objects Key = Class Value = Vector of listeners

hashCacheSelectAllHub

protected static java.util.Hashtable hashCacheSelectAllHub
Used by Cache to store all hubs that have selected all objects. Key = Class Value = WeakRef of Hubs

hashCacheNamedHub

protected static java.util.Hashtable hashCacheNamedHub
Used by Cache to store a Hub using a name. Key = upperCase(Name) Value = Hub

lstRehash

protected static java.util.ArrayList lstRehash

rehash

public static void rehash(OAObject oaObj,
                          OAObjectKey keyOld)
This is called by OAObjectKeyDelegate.updateKey() when an OAObject.OAObjectKey is changed so that it can be rehashed.

Parameters:
